commit.message:
refactor: extract common config functionality and introduce add config (#9635)

refactor: extract common config functionality and introduce add config

part of #9417

fix(TypeScript): binder should allow typing decimal numbers (#9604)

* WIP: fix(TypeScript): binder should allow typing decimal numbers

Fixes #9521
Fixes #9522

* fix linter error

* fix: disallow incorrect decimal separator (,) and extra characters

* fix linter errors

* cleaup: remove debugger
chore: avoid race condition in test (#9674)

feat: allow endpoints to work on non-public classes (#9592)

* Allow endpoints to work on non-public classes.
Fixes #8168

* move testing endpoint class to fusion-endpoint module

Co-authored-by: Nikolai Gorokhov <nikolai@vaadin.com>
Co-authored-by: haijian <haijian@vaadin.com>

fix: use ordered Set for deterministic CompositeDataGenerator  (#9657)

Use LinkedHashSet (not HashSet) to keep the order of data generators in CompositeDataGenerator.

Fixes: https://github.com/vaadin/flow/issues/9656

feat: document level npm css (#9559)

Now there is a possibility to use the
"documentCss" key in theme.json to
inject npm css into the document rool level
element.

This is mostly for embedded web components
as they do not target document by default

Fixes #9533

* Use more targeted bookkeeping for globalCss

Have a full map on where the global css
has been injected to so that if we add for
shadow roots we don't add to document,
but we are able to add to other shadow roots.

chore: update ChromeDriver to 87.0.4280.88 (#9653)

this is a patch update

Fix: add the missing otf font extension. (#9686)

The file-loader didn't handle otf extensions so having a otf font-face
failed the build.

Fixes #9683

Add IT test for CSS loading order (#9613)

Resolves #9529

refactor!: Extract app config from deployment config (#9642)

Removes deprecated `VaadinServletConfiguration` and not needed `VaadinConfigurationException`.

Part of #9417

Feat: enable having a parent theme (#9648)

It is now possible to extend a parent theme.
This means adding to theme.json the key "parent" with
the value of the target theme and then this will
be loaded before the application's own theme.

Fixes #9587
fix: flaky unit test due to race for port numbers (#9710)

fix: verify theme folder existence based on app-theme name in @Theme (#9676)

* verify theme folder existence based on app-theme name used in @Theme

fix: avoid BeforeClient executions for nodes with different StateTree (#9715)

fixes #9397

fix: @ServiceRanking is not handled by the osgi bundle generation tool (#9716)

Use service.ranking property directly and avoid @ServiceRanking
annotation which for some reason is not handled by the bnd tools and no
rank is generated for the OSGI service descriptor.

fix: use proper logging for installing pnpm and its directory (#9724)

Fixes: #9571

Co-authored-by: Johannes Eriksson <joheriks@vaadin.com>
